buff.name: jz_BuffStuffed
buff.description_key: You have stuffed your self with too much food and can barley move until you digest some

buff.name: twitch_cooldown
buff.description_key: Cannot be targeted by Twitch Actions for the duration of the buff.

buff.name: jz_BuffBalancedDiet
buff.description_key: Because your eating a balanced diet you gain these benefits\n-Able to gain Wellness from food\n-Able to gain Health from food

buff.name: jz_BuffGoodDiet
buff.description_key: Because your eating a more balanced diet you gain these benefits\n-Able to gain Health from food

buff.name: jz_BuffBadDiet
buff.description_key: Your diet is not very healthy and it is starting to effect you. Try eating foods that contains all the vitamin groups.\n\n-1 Stamina per 5 sec

buff.name: jz_BuffVitaminDeficiency
buff.description_key:
Your poor diet means your not getting all the vitamins you need and its slowing you down. Cook and eat meals that contains all the vitamin groups to improve your diet.

-1 Stamina per 4 sec
-5% Mobility

buff.name: jz_BuffMalnourished
buff.description_key:
Your health is failing. You must eat a more balanced diet that contains all the vitamin groups in order to have a more healthy diet.

-1 Stamina per 3 sec
 -10% Mobility

buff.name: jz_BuffFatigueZToClose
buff.description_key: Zombies are to close to you to get any rest, get away from them or kill them to recover here

buff.name: jz_BuffFurniturHardRecoverWorking
buff.description_key: You are resting on uncomfortable furniture. You are refilling your Fatigue Bar very slowly

buff.name: jz_BuffFurniturSoftRecoverWorking
buff.description_key: You are resting on comfortable furniture. You are refilling your Fatigue Bar slowly

buff.name: jz_BuffBedSmRecoverWorking
buff.description_key: You are recovering in a uncomfortable bed. You are refilling your Fatigue Bar and Healing very slowly

buff.name: jz_BuffBedMedRecoverWorking
buff.description_key: You are recovering in a comfortable bed. You are refilling your Fatigue Bar and Healing slowly

buff.name: jz_BuffBedLrgRecoverWorking
buff.description_key: You are recovering in a very comfortable bed. You are refilling your Fatigue Bar and Healing

buff.name: jz_BuffSnakeBite
buff.description_key: A snake bit and poisoned you. You will need to find or make some Anti-Venom or you will get very ill. Anti-Venom can be crafted on the Campfire with a Venom Gland from a poisonous animal.

buff.name: jz_BuffSnakeBiteLvTwo
buff.tooltip_key: That Bite does not look good!
buff.description_key: Your snake bite is getting worse and the venom is spreading. You need to get some Anti–Venom soon. Anti-Venom can be crafted on the Campfire with a Venom Gland from a poisonous animal.

buff.name: jz_BuffSnakeBiteLvThree
buff.description_key: The snake venom is coursing through your veins. If you can last the day you might just live. Or you can find or make some Anti-Venom .Anti-Venom can be crafted on the Campfire with a Venom Gland from a poisonous animal

buff.name: jz_BuffLimpNotice
buff.description_key: You are very injured and limping. Heal up to stop the limp

buff.name: jz_BuffNaturalHealing
buff.description_key: You will natural heal while full with your Healthy Diet Buff

buff.name: jz_BuffStickySpit
buff.description_key: That thing spit on you and its all sticky you cant even move. Maybe some Acid would melt this stuff\n-1 Wellness\n-1 Wellness is not treated

buff.name: jz_BuffSmellySpit
buff.description_key: That thing spit on you and it stinks something horrible. It looks like the smell is attracting others\n-1 Wellness

buff.name: jz_BuffSplashOfWater
buff.description_key: You have splashed some water on your head to cool off a little.\n\n-10 Hyperthermal Resist

effect_group.name: Burn Left Foot Dirty Needs Aloe

buff.name: jz_BuffGrab
buff.description_key: It's got a hold of you
